class_notes: Due to the nature of the material, it is recommended that students have taken a philosophy course prior to registering or have background in philosophy.
course_description: Students will study two systematic areas of philosophy, metaphysics and epistemology. They will examine a range of texts and positions in those sub-disciplines, and they will gain an understanding of how they have evolved, historically.
sections: Class Nbr: 4393, Section #: 1, Type: LEC, Campus: OXF, Meets: TTh 2:30-3:45p, Instructor: K. Anderson, Status: Open
